reviews.review:
在贴吧看到的

“
 我去过天际省，到过亚楠镇
 畅游中世纪，流连诺拉村
 在陶森特当过猎魔人，也在纽约2.0打过外星人
 当过勇者除过魔王，也受过苦打过薪王
 然而这一切，全都比不上那穿过层层乌云，出现在眼前的天空城
 以及在沙滩上，跳着舞的伊丽莎白
“

A diferencia del primer Bioshock, el sistema de disparos fue mejorado bastante y la mecanica del gancho aereo muy buena.
Una de mis historias favoritas de un videojuego, el que no haya jugado esto esta tardando mucho.
Obra maestra.
Oh, apparently I didn't review this yet. It's amazing, don't listen to the hater. He's just having a bad day.
Es un juegazo con una gran historia, aunque con un final previsible.
Obra maestra punto y final.

Oynarken çok eğlendim ve hikayesi çok hoşuma gitti.

Oyunu, önceki Bioshock oyunlarını oynamadan oynadım. Hakkında da hiçbir şey bilmiyordum. Açıkçası oyun beni gerçekten kendine hayran bıraktı. Oynanış olarak aşırı özgün değil fakat doyurucu ve gayet zevkli. Grafik kalitesi ve genel sanat tarzı da oldukça hoşuma gitti, kendine özgün bir tarzı var. Oyunun en beğendiğim yanı ise hikayesi. Hem kafa açarak hem de merak ettirerek devam eden oldukça güzel ve bir o kadar da enteresan bir hikayesi var. Oynadığım ana karakterden ziyade benim çok daha ilgimi çeken çok tatlı ve tam kararında tasarlanmış bir yan karakter var ve oyunu benim için çok daha zevkli kıldı. İndirimsiz fiyatına da değer fakat indirime girdiğinde DLCleri ile birlikte alınırsa oldukça zevkli vakitler geçirtebilecek bir oyun. Tavsiye ederim.

Bıoshock serisinin son oyunu olan infinite, diğer oyunlardaki gibi doğa üstü güçlere ve bolca silaha sahip güzel bi oyun. tek sıkıntısı hikayeyi tam olarak başlarda iyi anlatamıyo oyunun 6-7 saatinde hikayesi yok gibi bir şey ama sonda gayet güzel ve birazda şaşırmış şekilde bitiriyosunuz. dlc lerini almanızı tavsiye ederim. iyi eğlenceler.

Bioshock Infinite is a strange case where the 3rd game in a trilogy is actually the best one. 

First off, Bioshock Infinite has a similar playstyle to the first two, with gun in one hand and plasmid in the other, but the setting is VERY different. You play in a floating city that worships the American founding fathers as if they are Gods. Your main enemy will be some of the people who believe and enforce this "religion." 

The gameplay is about what you'd expect if you've played the previous Bioshocks. I think combat has slightly improved in Infinite because the guns and plasmids are more varied and more customizable. Also there are a new wide range of enemies so it is good to have new challenges rather than falling back on the same old enemies we've already beaten. 

The story is actually very good in my opinion. I won't spoil anything, but for the first 80% of the game, I thought the story was good but not great. But the twists at the end really got me good. 

VERY MINOR SPOILER PARAGRAPH: 

In Bioshock Infinite, you have a companion named Elizabeth for most of the game. Simply having a companion is a great vessel to carry the story, that the previous Bioshock games didn't really have. Also the AI is very good, and it never feels like a burden. But now since your companion will always talk with you, and has her own very important backstory, the story is much easier to follow and to relate to. 

All in all, I know I'm 5 years late, but Bioshock Infinite is probably the best of the series. Good fun gameplay. Good soundtrack and art direction. Good story. All around good game that pretty much anyone can enjoy. 8.75/10
It wa good but not great ! The gameplay is perfect, bioshock style nothing to say but the story was very hard to assemble and understand and some keypoints to understand it could have been clearer

5 лет назад.. когда я в детстве увидел эту игру, я обратил внимание только на графику. я не видел всей гениальности и философии этой игры... Спустя 5 лет я заинтересовался концовкой, которую я не понял изза своей глупости и решил пройти её заново на на лицензионной версии с одним НО! я хотел понять сюжет.... иии знаете ? я не жалею тех 24 часов прохождения данного шедевра, ни тех денег которых я потратил на неё(-видеокарта) ))) Эта игра поразила меня всем что  есть в этой игре....Жаль что я не могу стереть свою память о данной игре и перепройти её... И ЕСЛИ ВЫ!!! Как я в своё время мягко говоря"обошли" её........ Не повторяйте моих ошибок. Купите её! купите 2 эпизода пройдите её!!! (хотя после первого эпизода у вас будет чувство что вас обманули.... то второй исправит это) КХМ* Спасибо вам 
Irrational Games и другие что подарили мне эти чувства которые я забуду... Искренне ваш(теперь) фанат!

Постскриптум:(сорри за ошибки я не русский) )))))

Всё бы хорошо с этой игрой, но портят впечатление баги. Только что словил баг в режиме "1999" - в дополнении к игре, замок на двери, нужной для прохождения, стал неактивен. Вот и всё. Вот и поиграл. Начать можно только с контрольной точки, которая аккурат перед этой дверью. Как только загружаюсь - замок неактивен и значит нельзя просить Элизабет открыть его. Спрашивать на форуме даже не буду. Такие баги обходятся только одним путём - начать игру заново. Не уж, идите лесом, тэйктуинтерактив.
英語力が中学生並みのおっさんには、日本語字幕だけでなく日本語吹き替えが搭載されている時点で高評価になります（笑）。実際ゲーム内容も面白くて、２週しました。

Even with graphical settings at their lowest, frequent stuttering and major frame drops, the gameplay and the story still managed to captivate me as much as when I first played it on the Xbox 360, perhaps even more. The steampunk setting, along with the themes of horrific religious indoctrination and [spoiler]the fragility of space and time[/spoiler], make for a brilliant game and a brilliant experience.

Cannot recommend enough!

İnşa edilen dünya müthiş. Hikaye derin, oyunu her bitirişimde sembolizmin ayrı bir katmanını keşfediyorum. Hem inşa edilen dünya, hem de hikaye çok iyi olunca, ve de ikisi birbirini mükemmel bir biçimde tamamlayınca, böyle bir oyun ortaya çıkıyor.
Favori silahım açık ara altıpatlar.
"Bilgisayar oyunları sanat olabilir mi?" tartışmasını bitiren oyundur.
Outstanding to say the least, an absolute piece of greatness.
Inception(başlangıç), Mr.Nobody(bay hiç kimse) filmlerini bitirince o boşlukta kalmışlık,hissizlik hissi aynen bu oyunda da geçerli.. Muazzam #RESPECT

This was one of the best games I've played. Ever.
Incredibly creative and immersive. 
I loved the amazing sceneries, buildings, shops, rooms, the zip lines and the weapons.
The story line was complex but not too difficult to follow once I go into the game.
The last battle was almost beyound me to complete, I have to admit. It took me hours to complete it! But in the end I was satisfied that I beat it without cheating!
Elisebeth was a great character and her help added a lot to the game.
I definitely got more than my monies worth of play time and enjoyment.
Only downer was limiting me to carrying 2 weapons. I was forced to pick a couple that I could count on rather than playing with all of them. Came down to the carbine and the volley gun. 
Again, WONDERUL game!
This game is super amazing! Pretty good graphics and cool story!

В своё время и третью, часть и вобще серию пропустил, решил наверстать, пошол по порядку дошол до Инфинети. И если 1и2-ая части,это шутеры с элементами выжевания, ну и немнога хорор, то третья это класический шутет. Сюжет был и в преведущих частях, правда во второй, он как-то через пень колоду ( задним числом в сюжет первой части, впихнули полоумную бабу,  котороя из своей дочери решила зделать божество, без свободы воли) но не суть.                                                                  
       В  <Bio Shock infinite>, за основу взята класическая сказочность, принцесса запертая в башне, королём-тираном, над башней кружит страшный дракон ( но всё не совсем так, точней всё совсем не так ).                                                                                                         
       Помните в <Half-Life 2>, Гордену Фримену в напарники, добавили милую девушку Аликс Венс, и игровой прцес стал живей, в Инфинити эта идея ещё более развита.                     И вот любуюсь я лицевыми анимациями Элизабет, и вспоминаю Сару Райдер.                 Я пытался сюжет Андрамеды серьёзно воспринемать, но тут Сара выдовала анимацию трёхлетнего ребёнка, и я со стула сползал.  Ещё тогда 2013-ом, можно было по-людски делать, ну не будем о грусном.                                                                                                  
       И так,  весь сюжет подоётся через восприятие мира Элизабет, она смотрит на мир широко распахнутыми глазами, но риальный мир не то что пишу в книгах, и Элизабет постипенно меняется.                                                                                                                 
       Отдельно надо сказать про локализацию, я прошол оригинальную версию, потом с лббительской локализацией. Сделоно качественно, не хуже "1с", может даже и лучше.      Поскольку сюжет подоётся на бегу, вглядываться в субтитры не удобно, а с русской озвучкой прям как по маслу.                                                                                                               
                           P.S. Спасибо авторам озвучки, актёрам, текстурщикам, и Анне Молевой за то что подарила свой голос Элизабет, актриса и косплейщица из неё лучше чем летсплейщица.

난이도 어려움으로 하다가 생각보다 너무 어려워서 참다참다 보통으로 낮추고 진행했습니다.
다른 분들도 fps에 유독 재능이 있으시다거나 실력에 자신있는게 아니라면 그냥 편하게 쉬움이나 보통난이도를 추천드려요.
아쉬운점은 길찾기 화살표가 생각보다 잘 보이지 않는다는거? 그리고 목표에 굉장히 가까워지면 화살표가 어디를 가리키는지 구분이 정말 힘들다는점.
그리고 또 다른 점은 한번씩 다른 npc들이 길을 막더라구요. 무기제작자 아내가 기도한다고 복도 중앙에 떡하니 있어서 한번, 배안에서 파밍하고 나가려는데 엘리자베스가 문앞에서 안비켜줘서 한번..
끝까지 안비켜주길래 결국 로드신공으로 다시 진행했는데 원래는 그렇게 길막하게 설계되지는 않은 것 같은데, 왜 첫트에서는 길막을 했는지 모르겠네요. 이런 사소한 부분에서 유저의 만족도가 떨어지는 만큼 좀더 세심함이 필요할 것 같아요.

위에 말했던 아쉬운 점은 사실은 너무나 사소한 부분들이고, 게임은 전체적으로 매우 재밌었습니다.
특히 어느정도 스토리가 진행되고 난 이후는 중요 대사가 나올 때마다 소름이 돋았네요.
스팀 입문작으로 같이 추천되는 툼레이더리부트랑 비교해보면,
전투에서의 재미나 전반적인 게임 플레이는 툼레이더 리부트가 더 좋았습니다만,
캐릭터 조작감이나 스토리에서 오는 감동은 툼레이더도 감히 범접할 수는 없네요. 압도적으로 인피니트가 감동적이었습니다.
두 게임 모두 추천합니다만, 굳이 하나를 꼽아야한다면 세일률이 높은 게임, 세일률마저 동일하다면 인피니트를 추천합니다.
전 인피니트 하고나서 왜 바쇽1,2도 세일 때 같이 사지 않았는지 후회중입니다.ㅎㅎ
Zorlama bir hikaye ile sunulmuş, her yeri taradığımız başka bir fps oyunu daha. Şehir tasarımları çok daha iyi bir oyunda kullanılabilirmiş, yazık olmuş.

几年前在Xbox上玩的，一路通关。
前段时间百无聊赖逛贴吧，发现了大佬对剧情的深入挖掘，细思恐极。
当时玩的时候觉得艺术气息跟浓厚，女主很漂亮(雾)
充满上世纪美国的氛围，战斗系统也不错，难怪被人称为神作。
Xbox正版入的，如今电脑版打折喜加一。
真正的好游戏不会大张旗鼓的宣扬;
真正的好玩家不会为了社交而去陪别人玩所谓的游戏;
祝贺你们来到steam，这里是游戏者的天堂。
它不是最完美的游戏平台，却是最好的归宿。
祝你们好运，玩的开心。
真的艺术品，打完了海葬两部曲，久久不能平静
Magnifico en todos los sentidos

This game is truely amazing. It completely stands up as a great sequel to the best game ever made (bioshock). The characters are great, every one of them are memorable from the main character booker dewitt to the side characters such as jeremiah fink or daisy fitzroy.

Some people might be worried that the game will feel like one big escort mission with elizabeth following you everywhere, this is not the case, first of all: she cannot get damaged, she gives you ammo and health in fights and aside from all that like the others her charcter is one of if not the most interesting character.

Among all the games many great elements is the crowning jewell (for me at least) is the story. The story is easily the best video game story ever created completely surpassing such games as: heavy rain, mass effect, the last of us, silent hill 2, persona 4 and even the  games predecessor bioshock it self. The ending will leave you truely stunned.

My one gripe with this game is the combat. Now this topic is very divisive, some people love it some not so much. Personally i think the combat while still very good isn't nearly as good as the origional. You can only pick up two different weapons at a time restricting the amout of variety in guns you have, you have a select few that you keep and the others you try once and never again. The vigors (plasmids) while they sound exiting i personally just ended up using shock jocky all the time because there was something about the others where the just wern't fun to use. My last point on the combat is a short one but in my opinion the most important, it just isn't satisfying.

But never the less this game is still amazing and well worth your time 9.5/10
Great game and even better ending to a beloved series.

Let me start out by saying this game is phenomenal and this is my first review on Steam because This game deserves it.

My brother kept hounding me for years to play this game but didn't really like how this was in the sky and not underwater (I know, stupid of me). I finally decided to play it and what an incredable game. The story was great, the characters although sparce (besides Elizabeth) made the game and city feel like a truely real place (something often lost in games today). Even with my 'sky city' bias I definately like it more than the second Bioshock and might even like it more than the first one.

Most of all Elizabeth really steals the show in a good way. She feels like a real person who is discovering the world for the first time and her reactions and facial expressions to situations are very accurate and believable.

I got it on sale but it is totally and completely worth full price. If you don't believe me just look at the reviews. Hope this helps

Tis' a good game. The Gameplay is engaging, but not complex. Just keep attacking people and hope they die. Call of Duty fans would call it a standard FPS experience which I agree with. Learning to chain attacks requires a little patience but with time, it is rewarding to learn every Vigor's special attacks. Traps aren't much useful though, since you too are forced too keep moving around. Graphics are hmmm.... let's just say they're okay. I didn't find the visuals all that appealing because of the cartoon-ish faces, but it has its moments. Visuals I give - 6/10 whereas gameplay - 9/10

Coming to the story, without any spoilers, you play as Booker Dewitt who's supposed to rescue a young girl to wipe your debts away with a strange man who had visited your office a few days ago. However, the city of Columbia has many other surprises in store for you. Story is pretty straightforward with a few minor choices here and there which ultimately make little to no changes in the main storyline. They're just for visual purposes. One more thing, the main storyline connects a little with the battle at the wounded knee of the American history. So, brush up on your history lads. 
Not too impressive but not that bad either. I'd give the story a 7/10.
10/10 for voice acting though, both Booker and Elizabeth. Their voices are awesome.
El mejor juego que eh podido jugar
It's good.
Its not actually infinite. It does have an end

Es el juego que se enfrenta valientemente a problemas sociales y religiosos y no evita la oportunidad de criticar puntos de vista extremos. Es un gran tirador, con un mundo glorioso, una co-estrella fantástica (¡Elizabeth!), Oponentes únicos y muchos personajes y eventos memorables.
真正的第九艺术，完了三遍还意犹未尽，

One of the most refreshing, beautiful and creative games ive played in a long time. Yes the game has its flaws but if youre looking for a good story, fleshed out characters and a great world to explore then i cannot recommend this game more. Its a materpiece.

Блин... всё прошёл. Прям вот всё, все дополнения и т.д. Короче. Мне нужен ДЛС, где в Лиз открывает порт в мир, в котором Букер выбрал полететь в Лондон, а не Нью Йорк... И жили они долго и счастливо. Вот просто тот же франзуцский райончик, как в последнем ДЛС, но что бы там вместо начала жести, просто была одна дверь в их дом, где всё хорошо, чисто и солнечно... А то это капец. И не сказать, что под конец всё плохо, но и хэппи эндом не назвать. Череда лютых смертей всех, к кому успел привыкнуть. Но вот один, последний персонаж из истории выживет и будет счастлив. Да плевать. Хочу хэппи энда с Букером и Лиз!!!!!
An amazing game, with an amazing story, and even better game play
I love this game and have played it on every level multiple times.  The Bioshock story line is one of the strongest I've played.  I enjoyed both PC and PS3 versions.  Very engaging.

Bugüne kadar oynadığım en farklı oyun oldu bioshock infinite. Hikayesinden tut işlediği konulara kadar hiçbir oyuna benzemiyor. Hikaye oyunlarını sevmeseniz bile bu oyunu oynamadan ölürseniz cidden yazık olur. 

Grafik ve seslendirme cidden çok iyi işlenmiş. Oyun hiç kendini tekrarlamıyor ve sizi sıkmıyor cidden bikaç duyguyu beraber yaşıyorsunuz oynarken. sürükleyici bir kitap okur gibi sonuna kadar meraklı ve heycanlı oluyorsunuz.

Böyle bir oyuna yan görev seçenekleri bile koymuşlar. Bu oyuna da bu fiyat çerezlik gerçekten torrentten bile oynamışsanız alıp tekrar oynayabilirsiniz.

Игра отвратительна. Наиграл 1.6 часов, я даже не могу понять что я делаю и зачем я нахожусь в этой игре, я даже не знаю КТО Я ВООБЩЕ В ИГРЕ. Так игры делать нельзя, сюжет вроде есть, но он отвратительно написан, в основном из-за него игра говно. Единственный плюс игры это атмосфера и окружение, тут не посопришь, хорошо нарисовано, Snoop Dogg сделал хорошую поставку в их офис, годно вышло. Игра интересна пубилке из-за Элизабет, которую тупо гуглят на сайтах для взрослых. Из-за кривого геймплея и отсутствия адекватного сюжета делаю возврат средст. Фанатам этой игры - земля вам пухом, родные, играйте в норм игры, купите Ведьмака 3 в конце концов, не позорьтесь)

I'm honestly not too sure why critics were hailing this as the superior Bioshock game when it was released in 2013. Then again, video game journalism lost its credibility a long, long time ago. It's not a bad game by any stretch of the imagination, however, the gameplay feels overhwhelmingly stripped down when compared to the first two entries in the series.

PROS:
- The attention to detail is superb. It's a truly immersive world.
- Voice acting and overall sound design is great
- Gunplay and vigors are solid

CONS:
- Pretentious, and inconsistent storytelling. Blah, blah, 'merica is so racist type stuff that has been done numerous times before. 
- 2 weapon limit. The other games allowed you to keep a full arsenal, allowing you to take advantage of different weapon capabilities on the fly. This is probably the key factor keeping the game from being as awesome as it could have been.
- Weapon and vigor upgrades are ridiulously expensive and don't seem to make a substantial difference in combat. 
- Ammo and vigor salts run out rapidly because of bullet sponge enemies thrown at you in large environments that offer practically no cover.  Sure, the previous entries had bullet sponge enemies too, but there were plenty of things within the environment to use against your enemies. Not so much with Infinite. 

If you can get this one on sale, I'd say get it. Not so much for the full price. This really could have been an awesome game had they not made it too oriented to casuals. It's all a sad, big missed opportunity..

I really regret that I cannot recommend this game. Well, actually I do recommend it if you like FPS in general. Storywise the game is  really good, and I would also recommend it if you are a Bioshock fan. 

However I just wanted to point out my dissapointment when playing Bioshock infinite due  IMHO to the poor level design. To be more specific because of the "gears of war" cover mechanics developers copied and pasted in a very very wrong way. The game is basically a succession of open spaces, with covers.. eveytime.. and again and again.. you arrive to a new part of the city, all empty, and some objects and boxes  for cover.. and then when you advance, "surprise" a horde of enemies, and yeah you play this cover game again.. and again and again... booooring!!! 
Don't get me wrong I like the gears of wars mechanics in some games and it's really fun, but I just didn't feel it right in this game. I actually just played the first Bioshock to make sure I didn't have the same feeling  and yeah indeed it felt much better level designed, no dummy or fake objects just put in place randomly.. just a "real" world to explore with corridors, rooms and actual open spaces!

Upon replaying Bioshock Infinite almost 4 years after first beating it, I have a new found perspective of this game and have a little more I would like to add beyond my initial review. This game is without a doubt, one of the most beautiful games I’ve ever played. Aesthetically, it works wonderfully for me. While not every level is filled with amazing detail or visual storytelling like in other games such as Fallout or even Bioshock 1, spending time in the world of Columbia is a treat. The colors, saturation, and world building it engages in are really well done. The game is clearly a relic of early 1900s America and it clearly still struggles with class divide and racial segregation. In fact, this country prides itself on white power and capitalism to the point where it plays a central role in the story. NPC dialogue, propaganda posters, and other elements throughout the world all help flesh out the world and are fun to stop and engage with. 
	One of the main subplots of the game plays into this class divide with a proletariat uprising. This violent uprising uproots the white elite of Columbia and through the combined effort of minority groups and the exploited worker class. This conflict places you on the side of the proletariat, mostly out of necessity, as you attempt to find a ride off of Columbia. Initially, the game takes a very anti capitalist approach, using 1900’s imagery of overworked and underpaid workers being exploited by self indulgent and larger than life bosses. Upon the proletariat victory, the game takes a much different approach, showing the communist leader, Daisy Fitzroy becoming the same violent and power hungry leader she sought to destroy. It definitely aims to show these two “extremes” as equal which is ultimately disappointing as one is white nationalist religious zealots and the other is working class uprising. Although many deem a violent uprising necessary for systemic economic change, it’s unfortunate how Daisy Fitzroy are merely pushed to the side, becoming enemies that are no greater than their oppressors.
	About halfway through the game, the revolution aspect of the game is completely abandoned, without any real meaningful conclusion. Elizabeth, of all people, kills Daisy Fitzroy, which essentially sends the revolution into a frenzy since it no longer has its face. Although it was kill or be killed with Daisy at that point, I thought Elizabeth would have resonated with their struggle a little more. The second half of the game deviates into a rather interesting many worlds theory type of story. It is here where the true nature of our main characters are revealed. Having played the game twice and watching videos on the subject, I am able to piece everything together a little bit better, but it is certainly the type of ending that will have you looking up explanations. It is a very high concept and some may view it as “pretentious”, but I for one have come to enjoy the ending. It does a fantastic job at concluding the story regarding Booker Dewitt, Comstock, and Elizabeth. Beyond the communist revolution and aesthetic of Columbia, it seems like this was the story they were truly trying to tell.
	One of my favorite aspects of the game was the relationship between Booker and Elizabeth. They start out as complete strangers and over the course of the game, they slowly learn how to trust each other. There are plenty of times throughout the game where Booker’s selfishness or Elizabeth’s headstrong attitude conflict with each other, but it always leads to growth in their relationship. By the end of the game, they truly do have a father-daughter relationship, where Booker would do anything to save Elizabeth. I don’t think their relationship is as natural as Atreus and Kratos in God of War, but I did find that Elizabeth and Booker had more chemistry.. Their interactions throughout the game are perfectly acted and add a lot to the atmosphere of the game. Having a character by your side, who is naive to the outside world, slowly discovering her purpose in life is a treat to watch unfold. The end of the game has an off putting tonal shift in which Elizabeth becomes this all knowing, and almost godlike that goes on to explain the ending of the game to Booker. Within the context of the ending I suppose it makes sense, but it is still weird nonetheless.. Comstock plays a compelling villain to Booker and Elizabeth. I love how clearly vulnerable they make him despite how worshiped he is in Colombia. He is clearly scarred by his past involvement in wounded knee and attempts to cover up his sins with religion, which is quite the opposite of how Booker handled that situation. 
The pacing of this game is incredible. The plot is constantly moving forward, with the only exception being the Lady Comstock fight, which slows the pacing down to a halt. This section isn’t that long, but on harder difficulties, it can definitely be frustrating . Besides this slight mishap in pacing, these is little to no backtracking or filler in the game. Naturally, that leads to a shorter game of about 12-15 hours, but it is 12-15 hours of riveting story that is never dull. Upon a second playthrough, on the 1999 mode (hardest difficulty), I found the shooting and fighting set pieces to be exciting. The rail system allows for a great amount of verticality to the game. You can approach fights in countless different ways, using height to your advantage. The vigors were also useful and I found myself relying on them more on the harder difficulty. At some points, I found the hitboxes of certain benches, staircases, etc to be unforgiving. Booker would often be stopped in his tracks and I’d be forced to move around the smallest obstacle. I also found that trying to jump on and off of the rails quickly would often be unresponsive or glitchy, making it difficult to exit and enter the railing. Despite these problems I found the game to be exciting and rewarding, especially on harder difficulties 
Despite some jarring 180 degree  story changes, spotty social messaging, and infuriating boss fights, there is something magical about playing Bioshock Infinite. The beautiful coloring of the world coupled with the mystery and mythos of Columbia, create one of my fondest gaming memories. The ending is really well done and each main character gets closure to their story (especially Elizabeth in the DLC). There’s a reason why people still make videos on this game almost 10 years after it came out. 9/10
This game is the Best game I have ever played. The art style, the gameplay and the story, everyhing is perfect.

Would have been interesting if they had used the original concept instead of just turning Elizabeth into a generic demi-god with handy time/space warping powers that can't die.

Downgrading to only holding 2 guns at a time is really fun as well, definately adds to combat and doesn't make it feel boring and generic at all.

And those SkyHooks, just WOW! Those sure weren't shoehorned in as some gimmick that completely destroy the feel of the originals

Glad they added them to Rapture too in the craptastic DLC follow up where you get to crap on the original story!

非常好的游戏。优点：虽然是2012年的游戏，画面却依旧不输现在的单机游戏，而且美工是一绝，完美展现了哥伦比亚的特点。剧情优秀且很深刻，而且代入感很强。人设上，伊丽莎白应该是我玩过的单机里塑造的最好的女主角了，从一开始那个不谙世事，天真烂漫，憧憬着巴黎的女孩; 到之后坚强，冷静，聪明的女人; 再到最后海葬dlc里那个成熟，能为目的不择手段，甚至有点冷血的女人，伊丽莎白的成长让我感触颇深。而且实际游戏里她给予玩家的支持和帮助也是很强的，像我这种硬刚流选手每次就指望着她扔来的血包和弹药救命了，还时不时得让她拉我一把。[spoiler] 唯一的缺点就是最后发现她竟然是我女儿，我好气呀[/spoiler] 回归游戏本身的话，个人认为是一款非常不错的fps游戏，而且操作难度还是不小的，主要是因为只能带两把枪，而且子弹实在太少。缺点：无限唯一的缺点不在游戏本身，而是烦人的闪退，经常打着打着就游戏崩溃，一回去存档点之后的全没了。海葬更是到了没法玩的程度，20分钟稳定闪退，搞得我只能视频通关了。我也查不出啥问题，游戏完整性检查了一遍又一遍，系统稳定性检测跑了几个小时，结果游戏还是gg。

优点：画质很棒很唯美，童话般的世界和剧情，代入感极强。近乎完美的游戏优化体验。是一二代的前传。等全部通关，一切真相大白的时候，或许屏幕前的你，也会为伊丽莎白的牺牲而轻轻叹息。
缺点：基本是一条线走到底，没有多结局和丰富的支线内容。有一个佣兵模式也容易腻烦。不适合多周目。

beyin yakıcı bir hikaye , çok güzel bir elizabeth , lutece kardeşler , yırtıklar ve daha fazlasıyla mükemmel bir oyun. İlk saatlerde kurulmuş olan panayır bile çok güzeldi. Her haliyle mükemmel bir oyun BioShock Infinite. Aksiyona girdiğimiz sahnelerde bize zevk veriyor ve bazı sahneler zorlayabiliyor. Ayrıca Elizabeth'e gelecek olursak , mükemmel bir yardımcı karakter. Hikaye dışında size para , cephane bulabiliyor ve yanınızdayken cidden çok iyi oluyor zaten çoğu zaman yanımızda. Gerçekten güzel bir hikayesi var herkese tavsiye ederim
